001package ca.gc.cra.radar.config;
002
003import java.util.Locale;
004
005/**
006 * Capture protocol hints used to select sensible defaults for packet filtering.
007 *
008 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
009 */
010public enum CaptureProtocol {
011  /** Generic TCP capture without protocol-specific hints. */
012  GENERIC("Generic", "tcp"),
013  /** Telnet TN3270/TN3270E traffic (TLS on 992 is common). */
014  TN3270("TN3270", "tcp and (port 23 or port 992)");
015
016  private final String displayName;
017  private final String defaultFilter;
018
019  CaptureProtocol(String displayName, String defaultFilter) {
020    this.displayName = displayName;
021    this.defaultFilter = defaultFilter;
022  }
023
024  /** Human-friendly display name for logs and help text. */
025  public String displayName() {
026    return displayName;
027  }
028
029  /** Default Berkeley Packet Filter expression associated with the protocol. */
030  public String defaultFilter() {
031    return defaultFilter;
032  }
033
034  /**
035   * Parses a capture protocol string.
036   *
037   * @param value raw protocol string; null or blank yields {@link #GENERIC}
038   * @return parsed protocol
039   * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the value is not recognized
040   */
041  public static CaptureProtocol fromString(String value) {
042    if (value == null || value.isBlank()) {
043      return GENERIC;
044    }
045    String normalized = value.trim().toUpperCase(Locale.ROOT);
046    return switch (normalized) {
047      case "TN3270", "TN3270E" -> TN3270;
048      case "GENERIC", "DEFAULT", "TCP" -> GENERIC;
049      default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException(
050          "protocol must be one of GENERIC or TN3270 (was " + value + ")");
051    };
052  }
053}
